content.body: For future reference, in case anyone else might find it useful, I’ve whipped up a bot that tracks when an issue’s comments are rapidly growing into a centithread. It’ll then automatically locks it to cool down, until a moderator can take a look at it. https://github.com/js-choi/github-comment-floodgate
We’ve added this and another bot that locks stale already-closed issues to our own proposal’s repository, and you might find them useful too if you have a high-traffic proposal of your own.
